steps.description: We review your resume and a short note about the role you want and the work you have done.

roles.title: Full-Stack Engineer
roles.summary: Build and maintain reliable web applications across frontend and backend with strong engineering fundamentals.
responsibilities: Design and implement features end-to-end with clean, testable code.
Collaborate with product and engineering to define scope and delivery.
Participate in code reviews and improve architecture and performance.
requirements: Experience with modern JavaScript/TypeScript and web fundamentals.
Comfort working across UI, APIs, and data layers.

roles.title: Frontend Engineer (Next.js)
roles.summary: Own high-quality UI delivery using Next.js with a focus on performance, accessibility, and maintainable component design.
responsibilities: Build responsive pages and reusable UI components.
Improve performance (Core Web Vitals) and accessibility.
Work closely with design to implement polished user experiences.
requirements: Hands-on experience with Next.js and React.
Solid understanding of HTML, CSS, and accessibility best practices.
Experience with component-driven development and code reviews.

roles.title: DevOps / Cloud Engineer
roles.summary: Improve reliability, observability, and deployment pipelines for production systems.
responsibilities: Build CI/CD pipelines and deployment automation.
Improve monitoring, logging, and incident response playbooks.
Support secure infrastructure practices and access controls.
requirements: Experience with cloud infrastructure and modern CI/CD tooling.
Strong understanding of security basics and least-privilege access.
Ability to troubleshoot production issues methodically.

equalOpportunity: EagleX is an equal opportunity employer. We make hiring decisions based on skills, experience, and role alignment, and we do not tolerate discrimination or harassment.

apply.title: How to apply
apply.subtitle: Email your resume, portfolio (if applicable), and a short note about the role you are applying for.
